people.name: Plato
people.bio: A philosopher in Classical Greece and the founder of the Academy in Athens.

people.name: Aristotle
people.bio: An ancient Greek philosopher and scientist born in the city of Stagira.

people.name: William Shakespeare
people.bio: An English playwright, poet, and actor, widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language.

people.name: Jane Austen
people.bio: An English novelist known primarily for her six major novels.
